summary: Working at an underground city storage facility, a young man discovers evidence of a murder and vows to bring the killer to justice.
cast: Matthew Scully|Robert Price|Elise Greig|Damien Garvey|Saskia Burmeister|Sally McKenzie|Mark 'Bear' Bulluss|Robert Mammone|Craig Ingham|Franklin Ruehl|Shevaun Lee Steffens
keywords: murder|storage unit|beaten to death with a hammer|murder of father|vow of revenge
title: Storage
